title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Index Drops 2.2% as All Assets Trade Lower
summary: Sui (SUI) fell 7.7% and Aave (AAVE) declined 7.5%, leading the index lower.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2654.32, down 2.2% (-60.12) since 4 p.m. ET on Monday.

None of the 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: BCH (-0.3%) and BTC (-0.8%).

Laggards: SUI (-7.7%) and AAVE (-7.5%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The entire CoinDesk 20 Index dropped 2.2% with all 20 assets trading lower, indicating broad market decline.
